attributes.action: Ensure Gordon Brown does not take over labour.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It seems Gordon Brown is being groomed to take over the Labour Party from Tony Blair.  We cannot let this happen.  Gordon Brown is the man that has deprived a whole generation of parts of our pensions.  We cannot let this man run the country.  Tony Blair as dragged this country to the brink, Gordon Brown will take it over the edge.
